languages.text: "Учитывая инцидент на мире-столице, офицеры блюстителей трижды проверили дары Навис Нобилите. Рада сообщить, что вашему здравию, Леди Кассии и экипажу ничего из присланного не угрожает. Однако при изучении шкатулки техноадепты обнаружили инфопластину с вид-сообщением, адресованным лично вам, и некие зашифрованные данные. Мы не смели прикасаться к ним без ваших указаний".

traits.locale_text: "Учитывая инцидент на мире-столице, офицеры службы безопасности трижды проверили дары Навис Нобилите. Рада сообщить, что вашему здравию, Леди Кассии и экипажу ничего из присланного не угрожает. Однако при изучении шкатулки техноадепты обнаружили инфопластину с вид-сообщением, адресованным лично вам, и некие зашифрованные данные. Мы не смели прикасаться к ним без ваших указаний".

languages.text: "Considering the incident on the capital world, the enforcer officers checked the Navis Nobilite gifts thrice. I am pleased to report that none of them threaten your, Lady Cassia's, or the crew's well-being. Having said that, a closer examination of the strongbox by the Tech-Adepts revealed a data-slate with a vid-message addressed personally to you alongside some kind of encrypted data. We dared not touch them without your instructions."
languages.original_text: "Учитывая инцидент на мире-столице, офицеры блюстителей трижды проверили дары Навис Нобилите. Рада сообщить, что вашему здравию, Леди Кассии и экипажу ничего из присланного не угрожает. Однако при изучении шкатулки техноадепты обнаружили инфопластину с вид-сообщением, адресованным лично вам, и некие зашифрованные данные. Мы не смели прикасаться к ним без ваших указаний".

traits.locale_text: "Considering the incident at the capital world, the enforcer officers checked the Navis Nobilite gifts not once but thrice. I am pleased to report that none of them threaten your, Lady Cassia's or the crew's well bring. Having said that, a closer examination of the box by the tech-adepts revealed a data-slate with a vid-message addressed to personally to you and some kind of a hidden encryption. We dared not touch them without your instructions."

"Considering the incident at the capital world, the enforcer officers checked the Navis Nobilite gifts not once but thrice. I am pleased to report that none of them threaten your, Lady Cassia's or the crew's well bring. Having said that, a closer examination of the box by the tech-adepts revealed a data-slate with a vid-message addressed to personally to you and some kind of a hidden encryption. We dared not touch them without your instructions."

Having said that, a closer examination of the strongbox by the Tech-Adepts revealed a data-slate with a vid-message addressed personally to you alongside some kind of encrypted data. We dared not touch them without your instructions."

Having said that, a closer examination of the strongbox by the Tech-Adepts revealed a data-slate with a vid-message addressed personally to you alongside some kind of encrypted data. "Considering the incident on the capital world, the enforcer officers checked the Navis Nobilite gifts thrice. I am pleased to report that none of them threaten your, Lady Cassia's, or the crew's well-being. Having said that, a closer examination of the strongbox by the Tech-Adepts revealed a data-slate with a vid-message addressed personally to you alongside some kind of encrypted data. We dared not touch them without your instructions."

languages.text: “考虑到首都世界发生的事故，执法者对导航宗族的礼物仔细检查了三遍。我很高兴地告知您，这些箱子没有任何威胁，不会影响到您、卡西娅女士与船员的安全。话虽如此，技术人员依然检查了保险箱，在其中发现了一个数据板，里面有留给您的视讯信息，还有一部分隐藏的加密信息。我们不该擅自操作，正在等待您的指示。”
languages.original_text: "Considering the incident on the capital world, the enforcer officers checked the Navis Nobilite gifts thrice. I am pleased to report that none of them threaten your, Lady Cassia's, or the crew's well-being. Having said that, a closer examination of the strongbox by the Tech-Adepts revealed a data-slate with a vid-message addressed personally to you alongside some kind of encrypted data. We dared not touch them without your instructions."

traits.locale_text: “考虑到首都世界发生的事故，执法者对导航宗族的礼物仔细检查了三遍。我很高兴地告知您，这些箱子没有任何威胁，不会影响到您、卡西娅女士与船员的安全。话虽如此，技术人员依然检查了保险箱，在其中发现了一个数据板，里面有留给您的视讯信息，还有一部分隐藏的加密信息。我们不该擅自操作，正在等待您的指示。”

languages.text: « Compte tenu de l'incident survenu dans le monde-capitale, les prévôts ont examiné les cadeaux de la Navis Nobilite à trois reprises. J'ai le plaisir de vous annoncer qu'aucun d'entre eux ne menace votre sécurité, celle de dame Cassia ou de l'équipage. Cela dit, lorsque les technoprêtres ont examiné le coffre-fort de plus près, ils ont découvert une plaque de données contenant un message vidéo qui vous est personnellement adressé, ainsi que d'autres données cryptées. Nous n'avons pas osé y toucher avant de recevoir vos instructions. »
languages.original_text: "Considering the incident on the capital world, the enforcer officers checked the Navis Nobilite gifts thrice. I am pleased to report that none of them threaten your, Lady Cassia's, or the crew's well-being. Having said that, a closer examination of the strongbox by the Tech-Adepts revealed a data-slate with a vid-message addressed personally to you alongside some kind of encrypted data. We dared not touch them without your instructions."

traits.locale_text: « Compte tenu de l'incident survenu dans le monde-capitale, les prévôts ont examiné les cadeaux de la Navis Nobilite à trois reprises. J'ai le plaisir de vous annoncer qu'aucun d'entre eux ne menace votre sécurité, celle de dame Cassia ou de l'équipage. Cela dit, lorsque les technoprêtres ont examiné le coffre-fort de plus près, ils ont découvert une plaque de données contenant un message vidéo qui vous est personnellement adressé, ainsi que d'autres données cryptées. Nous n'avons pas osé y toucher avant de recevoir vos instructions. »

languages.text: «Teniendo presente el incidente ocurrido en el mundo capital, los guardias registraron los regalos de la Navis Nobilite varias veces. Me alegra informarle de que ninguno supone un peligro para usted, Lady Cassia o la tripulación. Dicho esto, después de que los tecnoadeptos examinaran la caja fuerte más a fondo, encontraron una tablilla de datos con un videomensaje dirigido a usted, junto con ciertos datos encriptados. No quisimos tocarlos sin antes recibir su consentimiento».
languages.original_text: "Considering the incident on the capital world, the enforcer officers checked the Navis Nobilite gifts thrice. I am pleased to report that none of them threaten your, Lady Cassia's, or the crew's well-being. Having said that, a closer examination of the strongbox by the Tech-Adepts revealed a data-slate with a vid-message addressed personally to you alongside some kind of encrypted data. We dared not touch them without your instructions."

traits.locale_text: «Teniendo presente el incidente ocurrido en el mundo capital, los guardias registraron los regalos de la Navis Nobilite varias veces. Me alegra informarle de que ninguno supone un peligro para usted, Lady Cassia o la tripulación. Dicho esto, después de que los tecnoadeptos examinaran la caja fuerte más a fondo, encontraron una tablilla de datos con un videomensaje dirigido a usted, junto con ciertos datos encriptados. No quisimos tocarlos sin antes recibir su consentimiento».

languages.text: 「首都惑星での事件を考慮し、エンフォーサーは航宙貴族の贈り物を入念にチェックしました。あなたやレディ・カシア、乗組員を危険にさらすようなものはなかったことをご報告いたします。とはいえ、技術要員が貴重品箱を詳しく調べたところ、暗号化されたデータとともに、あなた宛てのビデオメッセージの入ったデータスレートが見つかりました。あなたの指示を受けておりませんので、あえてそれらに触れることはしませんでした」
languages.original_text: "Considering the incident on the capital world, the enforcer officers checked the Navis Nobilite gifts thrice. I am pleased to report that none of them threaten your, Lady Cassia's, or the crew's well-being. Having said that, a closer examination of the strongbox by the Tech-Adepts revealed a data-slate with a vid-message addressed personally to you alongside some kind of encrypted data. We dared not touch them without your instructions."

traits.locale_text: 「首都惑星での事件を考慮し、エンフォーサーは航宙貴族の贈り物を入念にチェックしました。あなたやレディ・カシア、乗組員を危険にさらすようなものはなかったことをご報告いたします。とはいえ、技術要員が貴重品箱を詳しく調べたところ、暗号化されたデータとともに、あなた宛てのビデオメッセージの入ったデータスレートが見つかりました。あなたの指示を受けておりませんので、あえてそれらに触れることはしませんでした」

languages.text: "Nach dem Vorfall auf der Hauptwelt haben die Enforcer-Offiziere die Geschenke der Navis Nobilite dreimal überprüft. Es freut mich, Euch zu berichten, dass keines von ihnen Euer Wohlergehen oder das von Lady Cassia oder der Crew gefährdet. Abgesehen davon wurde bei einer genaueren Prüfung des Tresors durch die Techadepten allerdings ein Datablock mit einer Vid-Nachricht gefunden, die an Euch persönlich gerichtet ist und verschlüsselte Daten enthält. Natürlich haben wir sie nicht aufgerufen, ohne zuerst Eure Anweisungen abzuwarten."
languages.original_text: "Considering the incident on the capital world, the enforcer officers checked the Navis Nobilite gifts thrice. I am pleased to report that none of them threaten your, Lady Cassia's, or the crew's well-being. Having said that, a closer examination of the strongbox by the Tech-Adepts revealed a data-slate with a vid-message addressed personally to you alongside some kind of encrypted data. We dared not touch them without your instructions."

languages.text: "Başdünyada cereyan eden hadiseden ötürü infazcı subaylarımız, Navis Nobilite'nin hediyelerini üç kez inceledi. Bu hediyelerin size, Leydi Cassia'ya yahut mürettebata bir zararının olmayacağını bildirmekten memnuniyet duyarım. Fakat Tekno Uzmanlarca yapılan teferruatlı tetkikin ardından kasada bir databela bulundu. Hususi olarak sizin için kaydedilmiş bir video mesajı içerdiği için emriniz olmadan dokunmadık tabii."
languages.original_text: "Considering the incident on the capital world, the enforcer officers checked the Navis Nobilite gifts thrice. I am pleased to report that none of them threaten your, Lady Cassia's, or the crew's well-being. Having said that, a closer examination of the strongbox by the Tech-Adepts revealed a data-slate with a vid-message addressed personally to you alongside some kind of encrypted data. We dared not touch them without your instructions."
